item.title: Short Form Video Editor for Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in creating short form videos for Instagram. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Instagram's video format and be able to produce engaging and attention-grabbing content. The main responsibilities will include editing raw footage, adding visual effects, transitions, and sound, as well as optimizing videos for various social media platforms.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
  - Strong knowledge of Instagram's video specifications and best practices
  - Ability to create visually appealing and cohesive videos
  - Attention to detail and excellent time management skills

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who has prior experience working on Instagram videos and can deliver high-quality results within the given timeframe. (Option to extend in the future, possible connections to more work as well)

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Management Assistance - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a dedicated individual to manage our social media accounts (3-5 accounts) and create engaging content for our business. We help people develop a positive financial mindset through psychology. We also have a podcast and YT channel.

Responsibilities:

- Full Social Media Management: Handle all our social media accounts.
- Content Creation: Develop content that fits our brand.
- Social Media Evaluation: Assess our current social media presence and suggest improvements.
- Content Editing: Ensure all content is polished and professional.
- Posting: Schedule and post content regularly.
- SEO and Keyword Research: Find the best keywords and hashtags to use.
- Social Media Content Plan: Create a plan for our social media posts.
- Script Writing: Write scripts for videos or other multimedia content.
- Overall Management: Oversee all aspects of our social media.
- Podcast video and audio editing

Requirements:

- Excellent written and verbal communication skills and fluent in English
- Self-motivated and able to work independently
- Experience in social media management and content creation
- Knowledge of SEO and keyword research
- Strong writing and editing skills
- Short form and long form video editing

  Duration: 3 to 6 months to begin with. Looking for long term

To Apply:

Please provide examples of your previous work, especially any content you've created for social media. Let us know how you approach social media management and what tools you use and your rate.

We look forward to working with someone who is excited to help us grow our social media presence!


Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:03 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Media & Entertainment, Art & Design, Sales & Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Engagement, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Social Media Audience Research, Audio Editing
Skills: Media & Entertainment, Art & Design, Sales & Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Engagement, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Social Media Audience Research, Audio Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Expert Needed to Create Professional YouTube Channel Trailer for Software Company - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
We are a software manufacturer specializing in document management solutions. We are seeking a talented video production expert to create a professional and engaging YouTube channel trailer for our brand. We have attached a video to use as the storyboard, and we need an Adobe After Effects expert to polish it to perfection.

Responsibilities:
Review and refine the existing draft video to create a professional, high-quality YouTube channel trailer.
Use Adobe After Effects to add visual effects, animations, and other enhancements.
Ensure the final video is engaging, visually appealing, and effectively communicates our brand message.
Incorporate any feedback and revisions as needed.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing and production, particularly with Adobe After Effects.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work on promotional videos or YouTube channel trailers.
Ability to understand our brand and convey our message creatively.
Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work on time.
Excellent communication skills to collaborate with our team and incorporate feedback.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience working with software companies or in the tech industry.
Familiarity with document management software and related terminology.
Project Details:

Duration: 1 minute

Please submit your proposal with:
A brief introduction about yourself and your experience in video production.
Links to your portfolio or examples of previous work.
Your proposed approach to refining our draft video.
Your availability and estimated timeframe for completing the project.
We look forward to collaborating with a creative and skilled professional to create a standout YouTube channel trailer that will effectively represent our brand. Thank you for considering this opportunity!


Posted On: June 25, 2024 18:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: [Las Vegas, NV]: 90-second - 2-min promotional video featuring small business owner - [$500] - Upwork
item.description:
This short video (1:30 - 2:00 minutes in length) is for a small business that will be featured on Honeycomb Credit's investment platform. The business is raising investment capital through Honeycomb Credit and this video is critical in telling the story of the business and how they’re looking to grow. It will include a brief interview with the business owner (questions provided) as well as some b-roll within the location. We are also looking to receive 5-10 high-quality photos of the business owner and their products. This project features a local business.

Looking to schedule the shoot for sometime in the upcoming 2.5 weeks. We pay a $500 flat fee at the conclusion of the project. If this experience is beneficial for both parties, we would reach out with future job postings in the area.

Google Honeycomb Credit to check out our website!


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 17:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Skills: Promotional Video, MP4, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography

item.title: Admin- download videos - Upwork
item.description:
### Task Instructions

You are required to process a set of Instagram video links by following these steps:

1. **Download Videos**:
   - Download each video from the provided Instagram links.
   - Save each video in a separate folder, numbered sequentially (1, 2, 3, etc.).

2. **Split Videos**:
   - Import each video into CapCut.
   - Use the "Split Scene" feature to separate the scenes.

3. **Organize Scenes**:
   - Download each split scene.
   - Place all scenes back into the original numbered folder.
   - List the duration of each scene in seconds.

4. **Chronological Order**:
   - Ensure all scenes and their durations are organized in chronological order within their respective folders.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 25, 2024 17:43 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry
Skills: Data Entry
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video Content Creator for Breathing App - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled UGC video content creator to produce a captivating video about our app, BreathPlayer. The video should highlight the app's features, benefits, and user experiences, and must be engaging and shareable. The content creator will need to be engaging, bring thoughtfulness to the video and be able to shoot and edit as necessary.
The ideal candidate should have experience in creating UGC videos, possess strong storytelling skills, and be able to deliver high-quality content within the given timeframe. Attention to detail, a strong sense of visual aesthetics, and knowledge of video editing software are essential. If you are passionate about creating compelling videos and have a solid understanding of UGC trends, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $100

item.title: Videography/Photographer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer based in the Houston, Texas area to capture high-quality video footage on location at our Education Director's hair studio. Preferably with a mid-July shoot date. The ideal candidate will have experience in shooting promotional and educational content revolving around professional hair products with product shots, and promotional videos suitable for ecommerce platforms and social media.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with our Education Director to plan and storyboard video shoots.
Capture professional-quality video footage of our Educator detailing hair products and techniques.
Record product shots to showcase various hair care products.
Edit and produce polished video content suitable for social media and promotional use.
Ensure that the videos align with our brand image and messaging.
Deliver final video files in the required formats and resolutions.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a videographer, with a portfolio demonstrating previous work in similar settings (hair studios, beauty industry preferred).
Proficiency in videography equipment and editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Ability to work collaboratively and creatively with our Education Director to bring concepts to life.
Strong attention to detail and ability to capture high-quality footage in various settings and lighting conditions.
Understanding of video formats and specifications for different platforms (social media, ecommerce).
Availability to shoot on location at our Education Director's hair studio in Houston, Texas.
Additional Information:

This is a freelance opportunity with flexible scheduling based on mutually agreed-upon shoot dates.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 17:33 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Product Photography, Fashion & Beauty, Video Editing, Photography
Skills: Videography, Product Photography, Fashion & Beauty, Video Editing, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

Deliver final video files in the required formats and resolutions.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a videographer, with a portfolio demonstrating previous work in similar settings (hair studios, beauty industry preferred).
Proficiency in videography equipment and editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Ability to work collaboratively and creatively with our Education Director to bring concepts to life.
Strong attention to detail and ability to capture high-quality footage in various settings and lighting conditions.
Understanding of video formats and specifications for different platforms (social media, ecommerce).
Availability to shoot on location at our Education Director's hair studio in Houston, Texas.
Additional Information:

This is a freelance opportunity with flexible scheduling based on mutually agreed-upon shoot dates.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 17:33 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Product Photography, Fashion & Beauty, Video Editing, Photography
Skills: Videography, Product Photography, Fashion & Beauty, Video Editing, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.

item.title: Law Firm Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview:

We are seeking a skilled and professional video editor to join our team. The primary responsibility of this role is to edit our long-form podcasts and convert them into engaging short-form clips suitable for YouTube Shorts, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Responsibilities:

Edit long-form podcast episodes into concise, compelling short-form videos.
Ensure the edited clips align with the desired format and style, as demonstrated in the following examples:
YouTube Short Example 1
YouTube Short Example 2
Review and understand the flow of conversation in podcasts to carefully select appropriate time frames for clips.
Maintain a professional and sophisticated editing style that enhances the quality and engagement of the content.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing, particularly in creating professional and sophisticated content.
Ability to understand and follow the flow of conversations in podcasts.
Proficiency in video editing software and tools.
Strong attention to detail and creativity in selecting impactful moments from long-form content.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to meet deadlines.
How to Apply:

If you are interested in this opportunity, please send your resume and examples of past related work. We look forward to reviewing your application.

Thank you for your interest in joining our team.

Hourly Range: $13.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 17:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: LinkedIn video creation - Upwork
item.description:
I need a short LinkedIn video created that features how various companies pivoted to become the famous and successful companies they are today. For example, Shopify started as Snowdevil snowboards. I will provide images and text; you create an engaging video using LInkedIn video best practices. There are 8 companies. For each, we will show the original website (if I have a visual...i have most) and then the current company and valuation.

Budget: $50
